summary: A comedy-horror-thriller in which a doctor and his teenage daughter are terrorized by flesh-eating zombies at a truck stop.
cast: Billy Zane|Maggie Castle|Shauna MacDonald|Evan Charles Flock|Jordan Madley|Ian McPhail|Rothaford Gray|Matthew D. Matteo|Christopher Gross|Angela Maiorano|Kara Wooten|Allan Price|Michael Rhoades|James Binkley|Sean Orr|Geoff Scovell|Bryan Thomas|Christopher Cordell|Steve Wilsher|Stephen J. Lang
keywords: flesh eating zombie|mad cow disease|cow|dark comedy|zombie
title: Mis apetitosos vecinos
